extendedInfo.description: Planning a trip this year?  Need something to pass the time?  Look no further.  Road Trip Travel Games gives you 6 apps in 1.  Play favorites like Road Trip Bingo, The License Plate Game and Scavenger Hunt and more.  Both Scavenger Hunt and The License Plate Game allows for up to 6 players to play at once.  This is a must have app for anyone packing up their vehicle for a trip across the country or just to grandma's house for the day.
